pages.metric: The Board of Directors of DBS Group Holdings Ltd (“DBSH” or “the Company”) reports the following:
First-quarter net profit rises 15% to SGD 2.96 billion while return on equity increases to 19.4%, both at new highs
seasonal factors. Loan-related fees increased 30% to SGD 185 million while transaction service fees rose 6% to SGD 231 million. The increases were moderated by a 38% decline in investment
Liquidity remained healthy. The liquidity coverage ratio of 144% and net stable funding ratio of 116% were both well above regulatory requirements.
Commercial book total income1 5,311 4,667 14 4,894 9 Net interest income 3,647 3,384 8 3,637 0
